name: Menagerie
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You summon between two to four beasts whose combined number of hit dice cannot exceed 12. They take their turns after yours in any order you choose, and obey your mental commands.

For each tier higher this spell is cast at, the maximum number of hit dice increases by 3, and the maximum number of creatures summoned increases by 1.

Casting this spell again causes all previous creatures to vanish. The creatures vanish if they are reduced to 0 hit points or the spell ends.
